verses.text: \w Wisdom|strong="H2454"\w* \w hath|strong="H2454"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w her|strong="H1129"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; She \w hath|strong="H2454"\w* \w hewn|strong="H2672"\w* \w out|strong="H2672"\w* \w her|strong="H1129"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*:

She \w hath|strong="H3196"\w* \w killed|strong="H2873"\w* \w her|strong="H4537"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2874"\w*; she \w hath|strong="H3196"\w* \w mingled|strong="H4537"\w* \w her|strong="H4537"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*; She \w hath|strong="H3196"\w* also \w furnished|strong="H6186"\w* \w her|strong="H4537"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*:

\w She|strong="H7121"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w maidens|strong="H5291"\w*; \w She|strong="H7121"\w* \w crieth|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* highest \w places|strong="H4791"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H7176"\w*:

Whoso \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w simple|strong="H6612"\w*, let him \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* \w hither|strong="H2008"\w*: As \w for|strong="H5493"\w* him \w that|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w void|strong="H2638"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*, \w she|strong="H3820"\w* saith \w to|strong="H3820"\w* him,

\w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, \w eat|strong="H3898"\w* \w ye|strong="H8354"\w* \w of|strong="H3899"\w* \w my|strong="H8354"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w of|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w which|strong="H3899"\w* \w I|strong="H3212"\w* \w have|strong="H3899"\w* \w mingled|strong="H4537"\w*.

\w Leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w off|strong="H5800"\w*, ye \w simple|strong="H6612"\w* \w ones|strong="H6612"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*; \w And|strong="H1870"\w* \w walk|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* understanding.

\w He|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H3947"\w* \w correcteth|strong="H3198"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* scoffer \w getteth|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H3947"\w* himself reviling; \w And|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H3947"\w* \w reproveth|strong="H3198"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* \add getteth\add* himself \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blot|strong="H3971"\w*.

\w Reprove|strong="H3198"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* scoffer, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* he \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w thee|strong="H8130"\w*: \w Reprove|strong="H3198"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w*, \w and|strong="H2450"\w* he \w will|strong="H2450"\w* love \w thee|strong="H8130"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \add instruction\add* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w wiser|strong="H2449"\w*: \w Teach|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w increase|strong="H3254"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w learning|strong="H3948"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*; \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* understanding.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H8141"\w* \w me|strong="H3254"\w* \w thy|strong="H7235"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*, \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w thy|strong="H7235"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w increased|strong="H7235"\w*.

If thou art \w wise|strong="H2449"\w*, thou art \w wise|strong="H2449"\w* \w for|strong="H5375"\w* thyself; \w And|strong="H5375"\w* if thou scoffest, thou alone shalt \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3045"\w* \w foolish|strong="H3687"\w* woman \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w clamorous|strong="H1993"\w*; \add She is\add* \w simple|strong="H6615"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* \w nothing|strong="H4100"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w seat|strong="H3678"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H4791"\w* \w places|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H7176"\w*,

\w To|strong="H1870"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w*, \w Who|strong="H7121"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w right|strong="H3474"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w their|strong="H7121"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*:

Whoso \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w simple|strong="H6612"\w*, let him \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* \w hither|strong="H2008"\w*; \w And|strong="H3820"\w* as \w for|strong="H5493"\w* him \w that|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w void|strong="H2638"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*, \w she|strong="H3820"\w* saith \w to|strong="H3820"\w* him,

\w Stolen|strong="H1589"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w are|strong="H4325"\w* \w sweet|strong="H4985"\w*, \w And|strong="H3899"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \add eaten\add* \w in|strong="H3899"\w* \w secret|strong="H5643"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w pleasant|strong="H5276"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w dead|strong="H7496"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*; \w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H7121"\w* \w guests|strong="H7121"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w depths|strong="H6012"\w* \w of|strong="H3045"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w*.
